user_query: I'm planning a company trip to a foreign country. Fetch the latest FX rates to calculate the expenses. Additionally, provide me with the server time to schedule the trip.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest foreign exchange (FX) rates for the relevant currencies needed for the trip expenses calculation.
Retrieve the current server time to assist in scheduling the trip.
Calculate the expenses based on the fetched FX rates and current server time.
